summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of workshop management application. Critical modal overlay issue persists despite claimed fix. Equipment registration workflow is broken due to modal overlay blocking interactions. Authentication, navigation, and UI rendering work correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay still intercepts pointer events preventing form interaction after adding brand/model/client
ui_bugs.selector: HTML element intercepts pointer events after modal operations
ui_bugs.details: Despite adding controlled states (brandDialogOpen, modelDialogOpen, clientDialogOpen), the modal overlay remains active and blocks further interactions. Error: '<html lang="en">…</html> intercepts pointer events'. This makes the equipment registration workflow completely unusable.

ui_bugs.issue: Same modal overlay issue affects technician modal in equipment review
ui_bugs.selector: HTML element intercepts pointer events after adding technician
ui_bugs.details: Technician modal has the same overlay interception issue as the equipment entry modals

integration_issues.issue: Complete equipment registration workflow broken due to modal overlay issue
integration_issues.details: Users cannot complete equipment registration because they cannot select brand, model, or client after adding them via modals

integration_issues.issue: Equipment search returns 404 errors because no equipment was successfully registered
integration_issues.details: Search functionality works but returns 404 because equipment registration is broken

passed_tests: Dashboard loading and module navigation cards
Navigation between modules (Inicio, Entrada, Revisión, Salida)
Equipment Entry page loading and form field interactions
Equipment Review page loading and search interface
Equipment Exit page loading and 'no equipment' message display
Authentication state management and protected routes
Form validation and required field handling

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (authentication and navigation working, but core equipment workflow broken due to modal overlay issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Modal overlay issue is NOT fixed. The controlled states were added but the modal overlay still intercepts pointer events, making the equipment registration workflow completely unusable. Need to properly fix modal overlay by ensuring the overlay element is removed from DOM or its pointer-events are set to 'none' after modal closes. Also fix routing for summary page (/resumen vs /summary).
